snippet.title: A breath of salty air for patients with cystic fibrosis
snippet.description: How surfers in Australia inspired the development a new device that taps the benefits of salt water mist to treat cystic fibrosis patients.

snippet.title: 'Game of Thrones' gets 'Frozen' treatment in new video
snippet.description: What would happen if the characters from "Game of Thrones" found themselves in an alternate universe where everyone behaved as if they lived in a Disney musical?

snippet.title: Salvador Dali's elephants get the steampunk Lego treatment
snippet.description: Surreality rules in a Lego artist's interpretation of the skinny-legged beasts from Salvador Dali's famous painting "The Elephants."

snippet.title: Giant NES controller table gets the steampunk treatment
snippet.description: Another NES controller coffee table has arrived on the scene -- this time with a distinctly steampunk flavor.

snippet.title: Huawei MediaQ M310
snippet.description: We investigate Huawei's mysterious black box, the MediaQ M310.

snippet.title: 'Star Wars Rebels' gets propaganda poster treatment
snippet.description: To promote its forthcoming TV special and series, Lucasfilm has put out a series of stunning artistic posters.

snippet.title: Sony's 85" 4K gets the full-array treatment
snippet.description: Shipping in 2014, Sony's biggest (and most expensive) TV boasts a super-accurate picture in a handsome package.

snippet.title: New health site lets the crowd rate treatment effectiveness
snippet.description: CureCrowd aggregates the experiences of others by letting them score the usefulness of various treatments from 0 (no help) to 4 (cured).

snippet.title: LG G Pad 8.3 gets the Google Play treatment
snippet.description: We already know that the LG G Pad 8.3 is a reliable and swift quad-core tablet -- but now it flaunts a pure Android facelift from Google.

snippet.title: Toddlers need treatment for iPad addiction?
snippet.description: It seems that some very young humans play with iPads nearly half of their waking day. This is leading to withdrawal tantrums of an extreme kind.
